name: Lion Forge Animation
address: St. Louis, MO. This Black-owned studio is recognized for its Oscar-winning work and commitment to diverse voices, though not based in Washington

name: D'Art Shtajio
address: Japan. This is the first American anime studio in Japan and a major Black-owned anime studio, but not located in Washington
description: D'Art Shtajio is an anime studio founded by twin brothers Arthell and Darnell Isom, and animator Henry Thurlow, working on hit shows and commercials

name: Small Town Animation Studios
